newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Three Russian fisherman die as ice breaks up.
newsitem.headline: Three Russian fisherman die as ice breaks up.

text.p: Three fishermen died when they fell into the sea as ice floes broke up in storms in Russia's Far East, Interfax news agency reported on Sunday.
Rescue teams managed to save 13 others on Saturday from Amur Bay in the Vladivostok region, where they had been fishing through holes cut in the ice, it said.
The sport of ice fishing remains popular in Russia despite the dangers. Rescuers saved about 40 people from drifting ice on Lake Ladoga in northwestern Russia on Thursday and Friday.
